summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Southwest Brandon St. from 29th Ave. Southwest to 35th Ave. Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing water mains together with fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 19472 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
